channel.title: CVE Feed for bPlugins -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for bPlugins -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-7727|2024-09-11T04:31:20.937Z -- bplugins -- html5%20video%20player%20%E2%80%93%20mp4%20video%20player%20plugin%20and%20block
item.description: The HTML5 Video Player – mp4 Video Player Plugin and Block plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on multiple functions called via the 'h5vp_ajax_handler' ajax action in all versions up to, and including, 2.5.32. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to call these functions to manipulate data.

item.title: CVE-2024-7721|2024-09-11T04:31:20.309Z -- bplugins -- html5%20video%20player%20%E2%80%93%20mp4%20video%20player%20plugin%20and%20block
item.description: The HTML5 Video Player – mp4 Video Player Plugin and Block plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'save_password' function in all versions up to, and including, 2.5.34. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to set any options that are not explicitly checked as false to an array, including enabling user registration if it has been disabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-43148|2024-08-12T22:15:03.813Z -- bplugins -- streamcast
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in bPlugins StreamCast allows Stored XSS.This issue affects StreamCast: from n/a through 2.2.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-30432|2024-08-02T01:32:07.362Z -- bplugins -- b%20slider%20-%20slider%20for%20your%20block%20editor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in bPlugins B Slider - Slider for your block editor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects B Slider - Slider for your block editor: from n/a through 1.1.12.

item.title: CVE-2024-30438|2024-08-02T01:32:07.437Z -- bplugins -- print%20page%20block
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in bPlugins Print Page block allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Print Page block: from n/a through 1.0.8.
